title: Capacity-Building Program for Quality Assessment of Blended English Education in Vocational Colleges

context.prior_knowledge: Vocational education management experience and basic understanding of English language instruction
context.additional_context: Training for corporate vocational education managers/leaders to design and implement quality assessment systems for blended English education in smartphone-dominated, resource-limited settings.

learning_goals: Explanation of a blended English education quality evaluation framework categorized into three dimensions (instructional design, implementation, learning outcomes)
Derivation of educational quality evaluation indicators using the Intuitionistic Fuzzy Numbers (IFN)-based CoCoSo multi-criteria decision-making methodology
Development of project-based assessment tools measuring learning engagement and educational effectiveness in small groups

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
